messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Funky Bluesy ABC's
messages.msgSnippet: We just got The ABC s by TMBG (they might be giants) and are REALLY enjoying it!! Love and Laughter, Amy snugglebugg.com Wife to Casey Mom to Quinlon and
messages.messageBody:
We just got The ABC's by TMBG (they might be giants)
and are REALLY enjoying it!!



Love and Laughter,
Amy
snugglebugg.com

Wife to Casey
Mom to Quinlon
and Morgan Moira

Cleaning and cooking can wait for tomorrow,
For babies grow up, I've learned, to my sorrow.
So quiet down, cobwebs, dust, go to sleep.
I'm rocking my baby, and babies don't keep.




______________________________________________________
Yahoo! for Good
Donate to the Hurricane Katrina relief effort.
http://store.yahoo.com/redcross-donate3/

messages.subject: Funky Bluesy ABC's
messages.msgSnippet: On my last trip to the library, I grabbed several music CDs in the children s section.  One is titled: Big Blues - Blues Music For Kids. It has the song,
messages.messageBody:
On my last trip to the library, I grabbed several music CDs in the children's section. One is titled: Big Blues - Blues Music For Kids.

It has the song, "Funky Bluesy ABC's" by Taj Mahal. Fun!

Mary Ellen

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
